translations.translation: He turned on them, striking out with his right hand.
Then he started striking them down with his right hand.
Then he turned upon them, striking them with his right hand,
He struck them with his right hand.
He then began striking them with his right hand, unseen by the people.
Then he turned upon them, striking (them) with (his) right hand.
Then he turned against them secretly, smiting them with the right hand.
And he turned upon them smiting them with his right hand.
Then he attacked them, striking with his right hand.
then he turned on them, striking them down with his right hand.
Then he slipped Unto them striking them with the right hand.
Then he attacked them, striking forcefully.
Then did he turn upon them, striking (them) with the right hand.
Then he turned upon them, striking (them) with (his) right hand.
And he turned upon them striking them with the right hand.
Then he turned on them, striking with his right hand.
And he turned upon them a blow with [his] right hand.
[37:93] He then turned on them striking [them] with his right hand, with might, smashing them. Those who saw him reported this to [the rest of] his people.
(Then he attacked them striking with his right hand) with an axe; it is also said that he fulfilled his oath.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { فَرَاغَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضَرْباً بِٱلْيَمِينِ } معناه احتالَ عليهم ضرباً باليمينِ التي حَلَفَ بها
 وهو قوله تعالى:

[الأنبياء: 57]
 وقال: باليمينِ: أي بالقوةِ والقُدرةِ

translations.translation:
And his saying, {فَرَاغَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضَرْباً بِٱلْيَمِينِ}, means that he tricked them with a lie.


And His [i.e., Allah's] statement is {Qawluhu Ta'ala}, "Exalted is He [i.e., Allah] in Might [i.e., in His power and ability], [and] Wise [i.e., in His knowledge and understanding]."


The Prophets are those who have been chosen by Allah to guide humanity. They are His messengers, and they are the ones who teach us His truth. {الأنبياء: 57}


He said: "On the right!" (i.e. with strength and power)

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبعدما استهزأ مع هؤلاء الأصنام الصم البكم الجامدين بما استهزأ { فَرَاغَ عَلَيْهِمْ } أي: ضربهم { ضَرْباً بِٱلْيَمِينِ } [الصافات: 93] أي: بكمال القوة والغلظة، فكسَّرها تكسيراً، وفتت أجزاءها تفتيتاً

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ فَرَاغَ عليهم } فمال إليهم سرًّا، فضربهم { ضرباً باليمين } أي: ضرباً شديداً بالقوة لأن اليمين أقوى الجارحتين وأشدّهما، أو: بالقوة والمتانة، أو: بسبب الحلف الذي سبق منه بقوله:

[الأنبياء: 57]
